name: Doubles (2048)
description:
Love 2048? No wonder - 50 million people around the world downloaded one. Filling frustrated trying to hit magic 2048? Wondering if undo would make a difference? Well, the relieve is right here.

Slide horizontally or vertically to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one (e.g.: 2+2=4 ... 4+4=8 ...). Get extra bonuses for reaching high numbers. Get the highest score to win.

Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games....
